name: AROHI SANGEET VIDYALAYA
briefDescription: VISION- The vision of AROHI under aegis of it's Hony.president,a social and cultural actvist sh.R.K Tikoo is;To revive traditional GURU-SHISHYA parampara.To tap existing and potential talent and provide artists with stage of perform. To establish music therapy and meditation centre for mental elevation of people, over burdened by stresses and strains .To deal with preservation, propagation, promotion and dissemination of Indian and regional culture(sufiana,folk heritage and miniature art of jammu, kashmir and ladakh,Tribal art and crafts and other facets of tribal culture.MISSION-To impart free education and training in music and art to downtrodden and physically challenged budding artists particularly women and children.To establish Gur
